about_the_game:
Fantasy Soul Revenge - Explore Your Fighting Skills

Beat all the Powerful Enemies having unique "Soul Power" as elemental magic, giant combo attacks (like ghosts, spirits, or mythic creatures) with Fantasy Soul Revenge. This action packed fantasy-based fighting game challenges you to struggle between evil forces of monsters comes in this gameplay stages. kill all them and boost your fight stamina with picking ground items and become a champion.

Features:

Dynamic Arenas: Arenas are inspired by both classic fantasy settings and ominous afterlife realms: a ruined castle, a molten volcano, a forgotten temple in a dark forest, or even a mystical "soul dimension" that alters reality as you fight.

Realistic Environment: Experience vibrant, detailed graphics as you navigate through diverse and challenging environments. Each level offers a new backdrop to showcase your action combat fighting skills.

Customizable Characters: Personalize your fighter with a wide array of customization options. Choose unique outfits to make your character stand out in every performance.

Boss Fights: Each chapter has a boss fight—typically against powerful beings like powerful demons, or other soul-hungry entities. These fights have special mechanics and require specific tactics. Smash all enemies with fast run body hits, jump leg attacks and strong arm flip combos and strengthen your superhero powers in Fantasy Soul Revenge.

Intuitive Controls: Whether you’re a seasoned newcomer, the game’s controls are designed for ease of use and depth. Perfect your attack timing and execution to fight land on those impressive tricks of defensive skills.

Weapons: Some Weapons can be collected from fantasy fight ground where battle occurs throughout the game. Some are cursed and offer powerful abilities to defeat big monsters.

Dive into the Arena of Fantasy Soul Revenge and unleash your inner fighter. Download now and start your journey to become a superhero who defense himself and realistic game arena where giant bosses are coming to kill the player.

Ready to take on the challenge? Get Up and attack to fame with Fantasy Soul Revenge!

name: Fantasy Soul Revenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 610
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Fantasy Soul Revenge is an exhilarating action RPG game that thrusts players into a vibrant, mythical world where dark forces threaten the realm. Players assume the role of a vengeful hero, harnessing the power of ancient souls to vanquish enemies and uncover hidden truths.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
